###Medium Plasma Disruptor Cannon II

   key = "MEDIUM_PLASMA_CANNON_DISRUPTOR_2"

   firing_arc = 90

			no_resource_for_component = { RESOURCE = sr_tallonian }
		}
   }
}

   key = "SMALL_HYPER_TETRYON_4"

         years_passed > 1
